ygData.subject: argh!
ygData.msgSnippet: its sad to see you go xillith :( granted there are jerks on all servers, but at least on fennin there are so many people that you are bound to find some decent
ygData.messageBody:
its sad to see you go xillith :( granted there are jerks on all servers, but
at least on fennin there are so many people that you are bound to find some
decent folk once in a while..

i got a decayed mail today, so that implies to me that 2 pieces are still
needed. (also my bracer in the bank was still "right"). however, since i
only killed one crusader for that one decayed, there MAY be an increase in
the frequency of decayed drops.

of course, one kill is hardly statistical :) i'll be back there later
tonight and i'll let ya know what i find

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
